metadata.description: Relation model for Revenue Stream Hijacking case 2025-137857
metadata.changes: Added 10 new relations from CIPC WinDeed documents including address, directorship, and membership relations

ownership_relations.description: Peter and Daniel Faucitt own RegimaSA (Pty) Ltd
ownership_relations.significance: Joint ownership establishes both Peter and Daniel's control and fiduciary duties

control_relations.description: Peter Faucitt (P.A. Faucitt) is director of RegimaSA
control_relations.significance: Establishes Peter's control and fiduciary duties; contradicts claims of separation from Regima entities

control_relations.description: Daniel Faucitt (D.J. Faucitt) is director of RegimaSA
control_relations.significance: Establishes Daniel's control and fiduciary duties

control_relations.description: Rynette Farrar is Sage subscription owner for RegimA WWD; controls access to financial records
control_relations.significance: Can deny access to financial records by not renewing subscription; system expired July 23, 2025

financial_relations.critical_note: Revenue generated on infrastructure not owned by ORG_001

financial_relations.additional_notes: Director owns 50% of both entities and charges rent to himself
Stock adjustment reflecting disappeared stock, same type supplied by Addarory's company

financial_relations.description: RegimaSA has R1,853 loan receivable from ReZonance (Pty) Ltd
financial_relations.terms: Unsecured, no fixed repayment terms, interest at rates agreed upon from time to time
financial_relations.significance: Establishes financial relationship between RegimaSA and ReZonance during debt accumulation period

financial_relations.description: RegimaSA owes R6,000 to Daniel Faucitt (D.A. Faucitt) as shareholder loan
financial_relations.terms: Unsecured, no fixed repayment terms, interest at rates agreed upon from time to time
financial_relations.significance: Establishes Daniel's financial investment and interest in RegimaSA

financial_relations.description: RegimaSA owes R500 to Unicorn Dynamics (Pty) Ltd
financial_relations.terms: Unsecured, no fixed repayment terms, interest at rates agreed upon from time to time
financial_relations.significance: Establishes financial relationship with Unicorn Dynamics, another related party entity

financial_relations.description: RegimA WWD paid R157,315.35 to ReZonance (July-December 2022)
financial_relations.significance: Large debt payments reducing ReZonance debt from R85k to R22k

financial_relations.description: RegimA WWD paid R20,529.03 to Unicorn Dynamics (March 2022 - February 2023)
financial_relations.significance: Cleared all Unicorn Dynamics debts by Feb 2023

email_control_relations.additional_notes: Rynette controlled Peter's email address, allowing her to control accounts system and financial communications
Rynette controlled accounts system using Peter's email despite Linda being employed as bookkeeper
Court order obtained to seize account from Kayla's email, interfering with law enforcement investigation

email_control_relations.description: Rynette Farrar has user account with Pete@regima.com in Sage system
evidence: User list shows: Rynette Farrar - Pete@regima.com
email_control_relations.significance: Direct proof of Rynette's access to Peter's email; explains how she could send emails as Peter

beneficiary_relations.additional_notes: Beneficiary being attacked by trustees using trust structure

professional_correspondence_relations.additional_notes: Bernadine Wright received trial balance from Bantjes, witness to his control over financial systems
Bantjies sent trial balance to Bernadine Wright for financial statement finalization meeting

capital_extraction_relations.additional_notes: Villa Via members loan account showing R22.8M capital extraction, monthly rental income R4.4M

inter_company_loan_relations.additional_notes: SLG pays interest to RST per loan agreement
RST advances R750K to RWW for production costs

knowledge_acquisition_relations.critical_significance: Bantjies knew of criminal matters before signing confirmatory affidavit

strategic_coordination_relations.critical_significance: Settlement signed 2 days before interdict filing demonstrates premeditation

professional_relations.description: Marisca Meyer prepared RegimaSA 2019 financial statements (issued 25 June 2025)
professional_relations.significance: Retrospective preparation 6+ years after period end; timing coincides with legal proceedings

evidence_based_relations.description: Bantjies owes R18,685,000 to Faucitt Family Trust
evidence_based_relations.legal_significance: Creates massive conflict of interest as Bantjies is also undisclosed trustee and accountant
evidence_based_relations.motive_analysis: R18.685M debt provides clear motive to prevent fraud discovery and dismiss audit requests

evidence_based_relations.description: Rynette controls Sage accounting system with access to Pete@regima.com email
evidence_based_relations.legal_significance: Direct proof of system control and email access enabling financial manipulation

evidence_based_relations.description: SARS conducting tax audit of RegimA companies
Adderory supplies stock to RegimA (potential fictitious supplier)
evidence_based_relations.legal_significance: Potential creation of fictitious or controlled supplier to manipulate revenue recognition

legal_relations.description: Ian Levitt Attorneys represents Peter Faucitt in R63M demand
legal_relations.significance: Establishes formal legal representation and quantum

address_relations.description: Alan Peter Louw uses PO Box 9477 Edenglen - same postal address as Faucitt companies
address_relations.legal_significance: Potential business connection between Louw network and Faucitt companies
evidence: CIPC WinDeed Report 293350197 - Director search shows PO Box 9477 Edenglen
CIPC WinDeed Report 293348688 - RWD uses PO Box 9523 Edenglen (adjacent)

directorship_relations.description: Alan Peter Louw is director of ALOECO (SA)
Martin Carlo Rizzotto is director of ALOECO (SA)
Alan Peter Louw is director of Marlouw Group
Martin Carlo Rizzotto is director of Marlouw Group
Alan Peter Louw is director of Big Business 301
Martin Carlo Rizzotto is director of Big Business 301

membership_relations.description: Alan Peter Louw is 51% member of Art of Buzztec (SA)
Martin Carlo Rizzotto is 49% member of Art of Buzztec (SA)

former_relations.description: Christian Gouws was initial director of RegimA Worldwide Distribution (shelf company)
former_relations.additional_notes: Resignation date before registration date indicates shelf company transfer
